verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> and <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G305>went<s%> up <S%G1909>together<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2411>temple<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G5610>hour<s%> of <S%G4335>prayer,<s%> being the <S%G1766>ninth<s%> <S%G5610>hour.<s%>

And a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G5560>lame<s%> from his <S%G3384>mother's<s%> <S%G2836>womb<s%> was <S%G941>carried,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> they <S%G5087>laid<s%> <S%G2596>daily<s%> <S%G2250><s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> the <S%G2374>gate<s%> of the <S%G2411>temple<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G5611>Beautiful,<s%> to <S%G154>ask<s%> <S%G1654>alms<s%> of them that <S%G1531>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2411>temple;<s%>
<S%G3739>Who<s%> <S%G1492>seeing<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> and <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G1524>go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2411>temple<s%> <S%G2065>asked<s%> an <S%G1654>alms.<s%>
And <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> <S%G816>fastening<s%> his eyes on him with <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G991>Look<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> us.
And he <S%G1907>gave<s%> <S%G1907>heed<s%> to them, <S%G4328>expecting<s%> to <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G5100>something<s%> of them.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G694>Silver<s%> and <S%G5553>gold<s%> <S%G5225>have<s%> I <S%G3756>none;<s%> but such as I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> I you: In the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> of <S%G3478>Nazareth<s%> <S%G1453>rise<s%> up and <S%G4043>walk.<s%>

And he <S%G4084>took<s%> him by the <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and <S%G1453>lifted<s%> him up: and <S%G3916>immediately<s%> his <S%G939>feet<s%> and <S%G4974>ankle<s%> <S%G4974>bones<s%> <S%G4732>received<s%> <S%G4732>strength.<s%>

And he <S%G1814>leaping<s%> up <S%G2476>stood,<s%> and <S%G4043>walked,<s%> and <S%G1525>entered<s%> with them <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> <S%G4043>walking,<s%> and <S%G242>leaping,<s%> and <S%G134>praising<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>
And <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> him <S%G4043>walking<s%> and <S%G134>praising<s%> <S%G2316>God:<s%>

And they <S%G1921>knew<s%> that it was he <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2521>sat<s%> for <S%G1654>alms<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G5611>Beautiful<s%> <S%G4439>gate<s%> of the <S%G2411>temple:<s%> and they were <S%G4130>filled<s%> with <S%G2285>wonder<s%> and <S%G1611>amazement<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> that which had <S%G4819>happened<s%> to him.

And as the <S%G5560>lame<s%> man which was <S%G2390>healed<s%> <S%G2902>held<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> and <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G4936>ran<s%> <S%G4936>together<s%> to them in the <S%G4745>porch<s%> that is <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G4672>Solomon's,<s%> <S%G1569>greatly<s%> <S%G1569>wondering.<s%>

And when <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> it, he <S%G611>answered<s%> to the <S%G2992>people,<s%> You <S%G435>men<s%> of <S%G2475>Israel,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> <S%G2296>marvel<s%> you <S%G1909>at<s%> <S%G5129>this?<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> <S%G816>look<s%> you so <S%G816>earnestly<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> us, as though by our <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2150>holiness<s%> we had <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G846>this<s%> man to <S%G4043>walk?<s%>

The <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> and of <S%G2464>Isaac,<s%> and of <S%G2384>Jacob,<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of our <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> has <S%G1392>glorified<s%> his <S%G3816>Son<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus;<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G3860>delivered<s%> up, and <S%G720>denied<s%> him in the <S%G4383>presence<s%> of <S%G4091>Pilate,<s%> when he was <S%G2919>determined<s%> to <S%G630>let<s%> him <S%G630>go.<s%>
But you <S%G720>denied<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> One and the <S%G1342>Just,<s%> and <S%G154>desired<s%> a <S%G5406>murderer<s%> to be <S%G5483>granted<s%> to you;

And <S%G615>killed<s%> the <S%G747>Prince<s%> of <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G1453>raised<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead;<s%> <S%G3739>whereof<s%> we are <S%G3144>witnesses.<s%>

And his <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1909>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> in his <S%G3686>name<s%> has <S%G4732>made<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> man <S%G4732>strong,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G2334>see<s%> and <S%G1492>know:<s%> <S%G2532>yes,<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> which is by him has <S%G1325>given<s%> him <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G3647>perfect<s%> <S%G3647>soundness<s%> in the <S%G561>presence<s%> of you <S%G3956>all.<s%>
And <S%G3568>now,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> that <S%G2596>through<s%> <S%G52>ignorance<s%> you <S%G4238>did<s%> it, as did <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G758>rulers.<s%>

But those things, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4293>before<s%> had <S%G4293>showed<s%> by the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> that <S%G5547>Christ<s%> should <S%G3958>suffer,<s%> he has <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G4137>fulfilled.<s%>

<S%G3340>Repent<s%> you <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> and be <S%G1994>converted,<s%> that <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%> may be <S%G1813>blotted<s%> out, <S%G3704>when<s%> the <S%G2540>times<s%> of <S%G403>refreshing<s%> shall <S%G2064>come<s%> from the <S%G4383>presence<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>
And he shall <S%G649>send<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> which <S%G4296>before<s%> was <S%G4296>preached<s%> to you:

<S%G3739>Whom<s%> the <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G1209>receive<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G5550>times<s%> of <S%G605>restitution<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> things, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G2980>spoken<s%> by the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> his <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G575>since<s%> the <S%G165>world<s%> began.

For <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G3303>truly<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to the <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> A <S%G4396>prophet<s%> shall the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G450>raise<s%> up to you of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G3945>like<s%> to me; him shall you <S%G191>hear<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G3748>whatever<s%> <S%G302><s%> he shall <S%G2980>say<s%> to you.

And it shall <S%G1511>come<s%> to pass, that <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5590>soul,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G302><s%> will not <S%G191>hear<s%> that <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> shall be <S%G1842>destroyed<s%> from among the <S%G2992>people.<s%>

<S%G1161>Yes,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> from <S%G4545>Samuel<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> that <S%G2517>follow<s%> <S%G2517>after,<s%> as <S%G3745>many<s%> as have <S%G2980>spoken,<s%> have <S%G2532>likewise<s%> <S%G4293>foretold<s%> of <S%G5025>these<s%> <S%G2250>days.<s%>

You are the <S%G5207>children<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> and of the <S%G1242>covenant<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1303>made<s%> with our <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> And in your <S%G4690>seed<s%> shall <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3965>kindreds<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> be <S%G1757>blessed.<s%>

To you <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> having <S%G450>raised<s%> up his <S%G3816>Son<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> him to <S%G2127>bless<s%> you, in <S%G654>turning<s%> <S%G654>away<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> one of you from his <S%G4189>iniquities.<s%>
